infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app requires access to your photo library to allow video uploads.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: This app needs permission to save videos to your photo library.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app needs access to your camera to record and upload videos.

plugins.photosPermission: The app accesses your photos to let you share them with your friends.
plugins.cameraPermission: The app accesses your camera to let you share photos and videos with your friends.
plugins.microphonePermission: The app accesses your microphone to let you share videos with your friends.
plugins.mediaLibraryPermission: The app accesses your media library to let you share photos and videos with your friends.
plugins.saveToLibrary: The app saves photos and videos to your media library to let you share them with your friends.
